title: Esther’s Courageous Decision
summary: Mordecai urges Esther to intercede with the king. Though doing so uninvited could cost her life, Esther resolves to go before the king, saying, 'If I perish, I perish.'

faq.question: What danger did Esther face?
faq.answer: Approaching the king without being summoned could result in death.

faq.question: How did Esther respond to Mordecai’s plea?
faq.answer: She asked for prayer and fasting and bravely agreed to speak to the king.
